version_description: New collection - minimalism, added share to snapchat and other small improvements. Thank you for using Ash!

Meet new templates pack "Tape"!
As always, you’ll find a lot of improvements and bug fixes, as well.
Thank you for your support and for using Ash, that’s what drives our work!

Meet new templates pack "Tape"!
As always, you’ll find a lot of improvements and bug fixes, as well.
Thank you for your support and for using Ash, that’s what drives our work!

What's new in this version:
- we've added the "stickers" feature. We hope you will love it!
- backgrounds templates have been refurbished, we split it into 2 sections and solved an issue with saving different backgrounds
Thank you for staying with us. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Email us at info@ash-app.com or DM us on Instagram.

What's new in this version:
- we've added the "stickers" feature. We hope you will love it!
- backgrounds templates have been refurbished, we split it into 2 sections and solved an issue with saving different backgrounds
Thank you for staying with us. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Email us at info@ash-app.com or DM us on Instagram.

Bug hotfix - the app crashed in some cases. We're sorry if you experienced such an issue.
Thank you for staying with us!

-We added more stickers, enjoy
-A few great fonts were added
-Bugs with color saving reset were fixed
-No more crashes once you switching the apps
-The app should work smoother now
Thank you for using Ash!

-Now you can add custom stickers (add your logo for example), don't forget to use png format.
-Delete layers easier, just drag them to the area.
-Quick fixes on some templates
-UI improvements

What's new on Ash
- Now you can add as many videos as you wish to one template. No more limits.
- A new feature "Filters", adjust your photos and videos, copy settings from other media or apply settings to all media.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
